description.para: Post surface lighting is evaluated after other surface illumination and can be used to implement lighting effects beyond those that correspond to basic positional lighting, e.g.

briefdescription.para: The path to the (unprocessed) environment map texture.

detaileddescription.para: All textures actually used by the dome light (irradiance, prefilter, brdf) are derived from this texture in a pre-calculation step.
